articles.description: The Redmi Smart TV X55 is sensibly priced Ultra-HD HDR TV, with support for Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos pass-through. Is this the best affordable big-screen 4K television you can buy right now? Find out in our review.
articles.content: Xiaomi entered the television segment in India back in 2018 with the Mi TV range, and now some significant changes are brewing a little over three years later. While the Mi TV range has always been c… [+13221 chars]
